Name: Berserker
Description: A frenzied warrior who excels in melee combat.

Name: Pacifist
Description: A peaceful healer who avoids conflict whenever possible.

Name: Paladin
Description: A holy knight dedicated to upholding justice and protecting the innocent.

Name: Fighter
Description: A versatile combatant skilled in a variety of weapons.

Name: Mage
Description: A master of arcane spells, relying on intellect and precision.

Name: Cleric
Description: A divine spellcaster who channels the power of the gods.

Name: Druid
Description: A protector of nature with the ability to shape-shift and command the elements.

Name: Ranger
Description: A skilled tracker and archer who excels in wilderness survival.

Name: Thief
Description: A cunning individual who specializes in stealth and subterfuge.
